name: mui-country-code-selector-monorepo
description: A monorepo for the MUI Country Code Selector and its demo page
author: Jari Ikonen

scripts.install-and-build: npm i -ws false & npm run install-and-build -w mui-country-code-selector && npm run install-and-build -w demo-page
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf ./node_modules && npm run cleanup -w demo-page && npm run cleanup -w mui-country-code-selector
scripts.clean-install-and-test: npm run cleanup && npm run install-and-build && npm run test
